body: @SeiKeikaku, mitsuha is both sora and futaba's younger sister, also sometimes referred to as miu in the series

2)Otonano Omochiya 3 
3)Otonano Omochiya Vol.6 - Ch.4-5
4)Otonano Omochiya 12

For anyone asking about the correct reading order: First is Omochiya chapters 1&2 (g/327738), then chapter 3 (g/244453), chapter 4&5 (g/340855), then 6 to 12 (g/322905). 13 (g/342710), 14(this one) and 15 is not translated yet.
